title: Playboy model accused of bludgeoning  psychiatrist to death and stuffing body into Mercedes Benz trunk
itunes:title: Playboy model accused of bludgeoning  psychiatrist to death and stuffing body into Mercedes Benz trunk
description:
Former Playboy model, 25-year-old Kelsey Turner, is accused of killing an elderly psychiatrist, who reportedly paid her rent and gave her money.

71-year-old Dr. Thomas Burchard’s body was found last month in Las Vegas, decomposing in the trunk of Turner’s blue Mercedes Benz.

Nancy speaks with Dr. Burchard's long-time girlfriend, Judy Earp.

An Expert Panel weighs in too:

John Lemley: Crimeonline.com reporter

Dr. Brian Russell: Psychologist, lawyer, and Host of “Fatal Vows” on Investigation Discovery

Kathleen Murphy: Family attorney

Michelle Dupree: Medical Examiner, author of "Homicide Investigation Field Guide"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
